text: The principle that human nature, in its psychological aspects, is nothing more than a product of history and given social relations removes all barriers to coercion and manipulation by the powerful.
author: Noam Chomsky

text: I'm definitely a Polaroid camera girl. For me, what I'm really excited about is bringing back the artistry and the nature of Polaroid.
author: Lady Gaga

text: Support by United States rulers is rather in the nature of the support that the rope gives to a hanged man.
author: Nikita Khrushchev

text: It is not to be expected that human nature will change in a day.
author: Frank B. Kellogg

text: The elusive nature of love... it can be such a fleeting thing. You see it there and it's just fluttering and it's gone.
author: Mick Jagger
